entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who is being addressed by Harry to stab the locket. He is also described as gazing mesmerized into Riddle-Harry's face.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who bellowed at Ron to stab the locket and also as the real Harry who snatched his fingers away from the locket.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione's head is seen blooming out of the locket, weirdly distorted.

entities.name: riddle
entities.description: Riddle's eyes are described as gleaming scarlet when Ron raises the sword.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort's voice is heard coming from Riddle-Harry's mouth.

entities.name: mother
entities.description: The mother who craved a daughter is mentioned in the quote at the beginning of the chapter.

relationships.description: Ron was gazing, mesmerized, into Riddle-Harry's face.
Harry bellowed at Ron to stab the locket.
